articles.content:
Unconverted long-term prisoners  should be repatriated
   Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- The Asian Regional Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Indian Committee for Repatriation of Kim In So and Ham Se Hwan issued an appeal to the peace-loving people of the world on May 24 calling for the repatriation of unconverted long-term prisoners in South Korea.
It noted that the peace-loving people of the world should strongly urge the South Korean authorities to take a step to repatriate Kim In So and Ham Se Hwan to the DPRK immediately.
  The South Korean authorities are opposed to their repatriation  for the reason that they denied "ideological conversion", it said.

Mongolian embassy officials help farmers
articles.content:
Mongolian embassy officials help farmers
   Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Mongolian ambassador to Korea D. Byambaa and embassy officials visited the Korea-Mongolia Friendship Jongbang Co-op Farm in North Hwanghae Province on Saturday to help it in farming.
   The guests transplanted rice seedlings with farmers. At a break, they sang songs and talked with farmers.

Dangerous war scenario
articles.content:
Dangerous war scenario
 Pyongyang, May 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed commentary denouncing the u.s. Imperialists for having changed "operation plan 5027" for a second war of aggression on the DPRK into "operation plan 5027-98".
   The news analyst says:   the new plan, more dangerous than the former, is an open provocation, intolerable challenge and a  sort of declaration of war against the DPRK.
   It envisages taking a preemptive attack instantly a slight "sign" of the DPRK's military movement is found. 
Under the plan, the u.s. Pacific command  is allowed to take a preemptive attack on the DPRK directly without prior consultation with the South Korea-u.s. "combined forces command".
   The u.s. Imperialists have already worked out a timetable for a nuclear war against the DPRK in "operation plan 5027-98" and are  waiting for a chance to train the fuse of a war.
   They are setting in motion NATO member nations for a war of aggression on Yugoslavia which is similar to the Korean peninsula in topographic features. This war is a test war, a preliminary war to verify the effectiveness and feasibility of "operation plan 5027-98" for a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
   In fact, the u.s. Imperialist war hawks have already made a signal shot for unleashing a second Korean war.
    We do not want a war but will not miss the opportunity if it is imposed upon us. It is the will and  disposition of our invincible people's army and people to deal an annihilating blow at the aggressors in the fighting spirit that you shall die and I will  remain alive.
   The preemptive attack is not an exclusive option of the United States.
   We have our own operation plan and the way of merciless strike.
